nodes.description: 扎哈兰·哈希姆过去曾多次周游印度南部。
nodes.support_text: Investigators said Hashim, who had toured south India several times in the past, had modelled the NTJ on the Coimbatore outfit.

nodes.description: 2016年，他们在哥印拜陀的一个附属组织因一宗谋杀案而面临调查。
nodes.support_text: But an affiliate organisation of theirs at Coimbatore in Tamil Nadu had faced investigation in 2016 on the charge of orchestrating the murder of a Hindu Munnani worker.

nodes.description: 2016年，一名网络圣战招募者说服喀拉拉邦人加入“伊斯兰国”。
nodes.support_text: An online jihadi recruiter had persuaded two groups of people from Kasaragod and Kannur to join the IS in Afghan and Syria in 2016 and moved them to their destinations via a safe-house in Colombo.

nodes.description: 国家调查局（NIA）调查了这些叛逃事件。
nodes.support_text: The NIA had investigated the defections.

nodes.description: 哈希姆的一名未具名同伙曾访问过泰米尔纳德邦。
nodes.support_text: They said another unnamed associate of Hashim, possibly one of the seven bombers, had visited Tamil Nadu.

nodes.description: 喀拉拉邦的至少两人与爆炸案主谋哈希姆有直接联系。
nodes.support_text: ...at least two persons in north Kerala were in direct and possibly prolonged contact with Zaharan Hashim, the architect of the Easter day suicide bombings in Sri Lanka.

nodes.description: 喀萨拉戈德的一对人与哈希姆通过帕拉卡德的伙伴进行间接沟通。
nodes.support_text: The Kasaragod pair communicated with Hashim indirectly through their Palakkad partners.

nodes.description: 斯里兰卡发生复活节自杀式爆炸案。
nodes.support_text: Four persons under scanner in connection with the Easter suicide bombings in Sri Lanka

nodes.description: 爆炸案发生后，“伊斯兰国”宣传人员声称NTJ是其附属组织。
nodes.support_text: After the blasts, online propagandists for the Islamic State (IS) claimed the NJT to be its satellite organisation and hailed the bombers as martyrs, including Hashim.

nodes.description: 国家调查局（NIA）在周日检查了印度嫌疑人的住所。
nodes.support_text: The National Investigation Agency (NIA) had on Sunday inspected their homes in Palakkad and that of two of their close associates in Kasaragod.

nodes.description: 安全机构正在分析嫌疑人与哈希姆的通信时间线。
nodes.support_text: Security agencies appeared to be analysing the time line of their communications in a bid to understand the nature of the contacts and when they occurred last.

nodes.description: 中央安全机构告知州警方，至少有两名喀拉拉邦北部的居民与爆炸案主谋扎哈兰·哈希姆有过联系。
nodes.support_text: 中央安全机构告知州警方，至少有两名喀拉拉邦北部的居民与爆炸案主谋扎哈兰·哈希姆有过联系。

nodes.description: 一名官员称，被调查的人员是一个“中间偏右的极端萨拉菲组织”的成员。
nodes.support_text: 一名官员称，被调查的人员是一个“中间偏右的极端萨拉菲组织”的成员。

nodes.description: 国际调查发现了帕拉卡德二人与哈希姆有直接联系的证据。
nodes.support_text: the international probe into the terror attacks has thrown up evidence that the Palakkad duo had direct contact with Hashim

nodes.description: 哈希姆是一位狂热的网络圣战布道者，能流利地使用泰米尔语进行沟通。
nodes.support_text: a zealous online jihadi preacher, Hashim, communicated fluently in Tamil

nodes.description: 斯里兰卡的激进活动在过去对喀拉拉邦产生了影响。
nodes.support_text: 斯里兰卡的激进活动在过去对喀拉拉邦产生了影响。

nodes.description: 官员们表示，斯里兰卡的激进活动过去曾影响喀拉拉邦。
nodes.support_text: 官员们表示，斯里兰卡的激进活动过去曾影响喀拉拉邦。

...were in direct and possibly prolonged contact with Zaharan Hashim, the architect of the Easter day suicide bombings...

The Kasaragod pair communicated with Hashim indirectly through their Palakkad partners. Their interactions with Hashim... were mainly through social media accounts and encrypted instant messaging platforms.
沟通事件的发生是后续安全机构试图了解其性质和时间的前提。
After the blasts, online propagandists for the Islamic State (IS) claimed the NJT to be its satellite organisation...
Four persons under scanner in connection with the Easter suicide bombings in Sri Lanka... The National Investigation Agency (NIA) had on Sunday inspected their homes...

该事件发生在复活节爆炸案之后，作为调查的一部分。
根据temporal_order，'say'事件发生在'tell'事件之后。
调查发现证据发生在卡萨拉戈德二人组与哈希姆沟通之前或同时。
根据temporal_order，'throw up'事件发生在'communicate'事件之前。
根据temporal_order，'impact'事件发生在'move'事件之前。
